title: I Cant download league only remove option no download
body: I deleted  league files because i downloaded league in the wrong place and when i went to redownload it the setup wizard wouldnt give me an option to install there is only remove option HELP!! is it a bug or league download link from 2016 outdated?

replies.body: That same download link still works, but it sounds like you haven't actually uninstalled League yet which is why the installer is only giving you the remove option. You'll want to fully uninstall League, which can be easily done using our [**Hextech Repair Tool**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool) with the options **reinstall and clean uninstall** turned on.
